title: World Battle of the Future
description: World Battle of the Future is a battle strategy game in a post-apocalyptic world with memorable characters and a variety of weapons and skills. Try your best to survive the battle, develop your soldiers, strengthen weapons, and improve your armor and skills. Get resources to buy more military equipment and warriors. Gain experience in completing various missions. Upgrade your army by improving skills and weapons. Strengthen your military base. An epic battle for resources and domination of the world awaits you!
